sentences.en: An unquenchable exuberance lived in him.
sentences.cn: 他身上自有一种抑制不住的活力.

sentences.en: Anyway, mankind is stunned by the exuberance and beauty of certain individuals.
sentences.cn: 总之, 人类被某些个人的富足和美弄得糊里糊涂了.

sentences.en: Her burst of exuberance and her brightness overwhelmed me.
sentences.cn: 她勃发的热情和阳光的性格征服了我。

sentences.en: Her exuberance of spirit was pruned down.
sentences.cn: 她那种奔放的精神不见了.

sentences.en: In the exuberance of his mirth , the unfortunate disciple had swallowed two biscuits at once.
sentences.cn: 原来这个不幸的耶稣门徒, 一时过分高兴一口吞了两块饼干.
乔恩朝气蓬勃，精力旺盛。

sentences.en: Longwood is part garden, part park and 100 percent theatrical exuberance.
sentences.cn: 长木既是植物园又是公园, 绝对繁茂昌盛得超乎想象.

sentences.en: Moral exuberance had inspired both overinvolvement and isolationism.
sentences.cn: 精神上偏激引起了过多承担义务和孤立主义.

sentences.en: Recovering slowly, with agony, from each of these recurrent blows, his unquenchable exuberance had lived.
sentences.cn: 他怀着极大的痛苦从这接二连三的打击中慢慢恢复过来, 而且他那抑制不住的活力竟也得以保持下来.

sentences.en: The sheer exuberance of the sculpture was exhilarating.
sentences.cn: 那尊雕塑表现出的勃勃生机让人振奋。

sentences.en: The speaker's exuberance enlivened a boring conference.
sentences.cn: 讲演者谈笑风生,使死气沉沉的会议顿添生气.

sentences.en: The two men have some qualities in common, a combination of exuberance and withdrawnness.
sentences.cn: 二人之间有一些相同之点, 有热情洋溢的一面,也有退缩的一面.

sentences.en: Their talk is often hard to fathom but their exuberance still comes through.
sentences.cn: 他们的谈话往往很难懂，但他们的兴奋之情还是显露了出来。

sentences.en: This search is pursued by Woolf through extremes of exuberance and disgust.
sentences.cn: 沃尔夫追求于热爱和憎恨两个极端之间.

sentences.en: What makes the whole thing so marvelous is the exuberance of the participants.
sentences.cn: 使这一切如此奇妙的是参加者充沛的精力.

words.tran_cn: 繁茂的；生气勃勃的，充溢的
生气勃勃地；丰富地；繁茂地
